data.name: Snapshot Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
All of the tunes from "Snapshot" crafted by the magnificent WiL Whitlark. This album includes all of the music from the game and more. Listen to 100+ minutes of music, including some "lost tracks" that didn't end up in the final game.

Track List:
  1. Leafborn
  2. Catching Stardust
  3. Forest Floor
  4. Words with Eyes
  5. Disarranged
  6. Conversation Principle
  7. Sophisticated Machine Indeed
  8. Hidden Surfaces
  9. Up Cmon Up
  10. From Dream to Born
  11. Cold Snap
  12. Planet Rising
  13. Devilishly Tough
  14. Rundown Reaction
  15. The Inventor
  16. Brownian Morality
  17. Obsolete Records
  18. Electric Ankh
  19. Erosive Rain
  20. Turned Away at Daybreak
  21. Hidden Hall
  22. Snow Scene
  23. Falling in Reverse
  24. Touch and Know
  25. The Wrong Side of the Spectrum
  26. Left Arm Right Arm
  27. Magic Flight
  28. Clouds Rising
  29. Chase Away
  30. Heavy Rain
  31. Memories on Trial
  32. Candlelit
  33. Air Style
  34. The Chariot Wheel
  35. Knowing the Meaning
  36. Locked Soul
  37. Pentacle
  38. Battle Ahead
  39. Pic is Alive
  40. Trembling Light
  41. The Sea Always the Sea
  42. Catching Stardust Taking Fire from Night
  43. Summer Moon
  44. Hotel Lobby
  45. Shattered Comet
  46. Catching Stardust Reprise
